General.Name: Globon Co. Ltd
General.Description: Globon Co., Ltd. engages in wholesale and retail of cosmetics. It is also involved in manufacturing of cosmetic containers and products; and selling household goods to retail customers. In addition, the company engages in the gasification combined cycle power plant and investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Veritas Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Globon Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Globon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
